content.description: Start compressing on to bad slopers with right heel and slap your way up the arete.
content.location: Located two boulders left of the cascada boulder. Short arete between two other small boulders.

content.description: Starts far left on good seam and uses good slopers to go up and right to the top out. Video Link
content.location: On the cascada boulder around the corner to the left of La Cascada.

content.description: Starts on a slopping edge on the left side of the boulder and goes left making a shouldery move and match to mantle and top out. Video Link
content.location: The Cascada boulder. A large, short boulder right at the bottom of the waterfall. Route is on the side facing the cliff.

content.description: Starts on a crack under the cascada boulder. Pull a couple moves then do a kind of tricky mantle to top out. Video Link
content.location: Starts in the middle of the cascada boulder on the low over hang part right between La Cascada and Cascada Traverse.

content.description: Start low on slopers. Follow arete to mantle top out.
content.location: Located in the stream as you approach the Cascada boulder. Most of the landing stays wet.

content.description: Starts high on good edge. Make dynamic move to top and top out. Video Link
content.location: Located on tall blank boulder behind the cascada boulder and Versicolor. Starts high on only hold on the face.

content.description: Start five feet to the right of the original Cascada Traverse, just below lip on right facing seam/edge. Make a couple moves on slopers to start of Cascada Traverse and follow lip to arete and top out.
content.location: Located on far right of the Cascada boulder a few feet right of Cascada Traverse. Adds a couple delicate sloper moves to the original traverse to complete the full line.

content.description: Start low on seam on the far right of the cascada boulder and traverse into La Cascada. Great problem and great rock quality. Video Link
content.location: Same side of boulder as La Cascada.

content.description: Start on two crimps, paste foot on boulder and make big move to good hold and top out. Video Link
content.location: Large boulder to the right of the cascada boulder. Line starts on the features on the right of the boulder.

content.description: At the base of a trickling waterfall. Can stay wet for a while, but does see a good bit of sun. Great rock quality. Open area, no trees, lots of small boulders.
